divs: Sighting DetailsI was going outside at 8:15 to let in the dog. I saw 2 moving26 blinking bright lights that resembled fireflies. They changed direction inflight, didnt act like a normal aircraft. I ran inside to get my fiancee so shecould see. We were both in awe - watched for approx 45 min until their coursechanged out of our view. These objects acted like yo-yos! They would comeclose to each other then move apart and change from solid or blinking white tosolid red. They would drop out of sight for a brief time then come straight backup into vision. There was absolutely no sound or visible trail of any kind. The maneuvers were extremely quick and sporadic in direction.
Summary: 2 sporadic flying objects moving all directions
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wentworth
This sighting has never been favorited.
